thumb.title: 【ARC】MORTAL KOMBAT - RAIDEN
thumb.description: 真人快打モータルコンバットMortal Kombat T-Unit Rev.5.0.0(1992, MIDWAY)Character - Raiden難易度・★★★★★ (Lvl.5, Hardest)Non-Tool Assisted Run1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost===00:00 Arcade Attract Intro00:07 Character Select (Raiden)00:17 Scorpion (Hanzo Hasashi)00:52 Sonya Blade01:31 Sub-Zero (Bi Han)02:06 Test Your Might - Wood02:15 Liu Kang02:57 Kano03:40 Johnny Cage04:23 Test Your Might - Stone04:33 Raiden (Mirror Match)05:10 Endurance I (Cage, Kano)06:13 Endurance II (Sub-Zero, Sonya)07:13 Test Your Might - Steel07:22 Endurance III (Cage, Sub-Zero)08:18 Goro08:54 Shang Tsung (Final Stage)09:44 Ending & Credits12:02 Thanks For Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
